titleStmt.title: The life and raigne of King Charles, from his birth to his death. / Faithfully and impartially performed by Lambert Wood Gent.
titleStmt.author: Bos, Lambert van den, 1610-1698.
Gaywood, Richard, fl. 1650-1680, engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Simon Miller at the Star in St Pauls Church-yard, near the west end.,

notesStmt.note: Lambert Wood = Lambert van den Bos.
The portrait is signed: R. Gaywood fecit.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Star in St Pauls Church-yard, near the west end.
